high_descs: Walk to the left side of the sink to your left.
Pick up the spoon from the counter by the sink.
Walk to the right side of the sink.
Put the spoon in the sink basin.
anns.task_desc: Move a spoon from the counter top to the sink basin.

high_descs: Turn left and start across the room, then hang a right and walk up to the sink.
Pick up the metal spoon off of the counter.
Turn right and walk over to the sink basin.
Place the spoon into the sink basin to the right of the glass.
anns.task_desc: Move a metal spoon to the sink basin.

high_descs: Turn to the left and take a few steps, then turn to the right and walk to the stove.
Take the spoon that is next to the bowl.
Turn to the right and take one step then turn to the left to face the sink.
Place the spoon in the sink.
anns.task_desc: To put the spoon in the sink.
